price: Porque são fiéis aos votos e temem um dia, cujo mal será alastrante.
arabic: يُوفُونَ بِٱلنَّذۡرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوۡمٗا كَانَ شَرُّهُۥ مُسۡتَطِيرٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: yūfūna bil-nadhri wayakhāfūna yawman kāna sharruhu mus'taṭīran
